translation_en: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,
translation_id: Apabila telah datang pertolongan Allah dan kemenangan

arabic: وَرَاَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُوْنَ فِيْ دِيْنِ اللّٰهِ اَفْوَاجًاۙ
transliteration_en: Wa ra-aitan naasa yadkhuloona fee deenil laahi afwajah
transliteration_id: Wa ra'aitan-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīnillāhi afwājā(n).
translation_en: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,
translation_id: dan engkau melihat manusia berbondong-bondong masuk agama Allah,

arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُۗ اِنَّهٗ كَانَ تَوَّابًا ࣖ
transliteration_en: Fa sab bih bihamdi rabbika was taghfir, innahu kaana tawwaaba
transliteration_id: Fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wastagfirh(u), innahū kāna tawwābā(n).
translation_en: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.
translation_id: bertasbihlah dengan memuji Tuhanmu dan mohonlah ampun kepada-Nya. Sesungguhnya Dia Maha Penerima tobat.
